description: Describes one or more of your carrier gateways.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: This API call helps in discovering the network configuration, including the carrier gateway, which can provide insight into how traffic is routed
Understanding the carrier gateways can assist attackers in planning lateral movement or initial access via carrier networks.
Describing the carrier gateways can reveal details about network connections and traffic flow between Wavelength Zones and carrier networks.
Carrier gateways' NAT function can be leveraged to hide the source of attack traffic, aiding in defense evasion
Identifying carrier gateways could be useful for attackers aiming to gain access to the network using valid accounts
Knowing the setup of carrier gateways can help in exploiting remote services that rely on this infrastructure
Describing carrier gateways can reveal information about the users and owners of the system. In the response there is the ccount id of whom this gateway belongs to
Insights into carrier gateways might reveal trust relationships between different network segments and domains
Information from the carrier gateway description can help identify other remote systems within the network.

incidents.description: Compromised Cloud Compute Credentials: Case Studies From the Wild

securityImplications: Attackers might use DescribeCarrierGateways to uncover details about carrier gateways in an AWS environment, which could reveal network configurations.
